extendedInfo.description: Deep Jungle Home mobile app showcasing details about the campsite at Mudumalai / Bandipur.Welcome to Deep Jungle Home a camp site surrounded by Mudumalai forest on three sides and small perennial stream on one of the sides. Just 20 km from Bandipur safari office and 10 km from Mudumalai safari junction. The road that leads to Deep Jungle Home from bandipur runs through the forest making it like a safari on your own vehicle.The campus is suitable for adventure and wild life based activities like bird watching, nature trials, nocturnal wildlife spotting, bamboo rafting, kayaking  and trekking.We also have enough place for out door games making it a suitable camp site for corporate outings and school excursions.Deep Jungle Home offers various types of accommodation including swiss tents situated on banks of a stream, adventurous camping tents, bamboo Huts and one village style mud cottage amidst the jungle. Located just 250 km from Bangalore makes it a perfect weekend getaway from Mysore and Bangalore.
